Child dies after being pulled unresponsive from body of water in Lower Hutt https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/child-dies-after-being-pulled-unresponsive-from-body-of-water-in-lower-hutt/A77RWYJHYVFILEN6OIOTVXTOKI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/child-dies-after-being-pulled-unresponsive-from-body-of-water-in-lower-hutt/A77RWYJHYVFILEN6OIOTVXTOKI/ Police said the death would be referred to the Coroner. Spearfishing incident: Man critically injured, airlifted to hospital from Auckland’s Mahurangi https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/spearfishing-incident-man-cruitly-injured-airlifted-to-hospital-from-aucklands-mahurangi/NIYM3SCXZ5EJFCLDCZGJMEZQ24/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/spearfishing-incident-man-cruitly-injured-airlifted-to-hospital-from-aucklands-mahurangi/NIYM3SCXZ5EJFCLDCZGJMEZQ24/ A winch extraction of the man was required due to access and incoming tide. Sat, 14 Dec 2024 07:35:40 +0000 An Auckland Westpac Rescue Helicopter crew airlifted a man to hospital in a critical condition following a spearfishing accident in Mahurangi on Saturday afternoon. Photo / Auckland Rescue
Northland meth cook Brownie Harding declined parole, asks to move prisons https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-meth-cook-brownie-harding-declined-parole-asks-to-move-prisons/POHCSYUV7RFSLOZZRLBWRUQXB4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-meth-cook-brownie-harding-declined-parole-asks-to-move-prisons/POHCSYUV7RFSLOZZRLBWRUQXB4/ Shannon PitmanBrownie Harding is now eligible for parole but is refusing to take part in a rehab course. Sat, 14 Dec 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Brownie Harding in the High Court at Whangarei during his sentencing in 2017. Photo / Michael Cunningham
Auckland Transport bus damaged after disgruntled passenger throws rocks at windscreen https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-transport-bus-damaging-after-disgruntled-passenger- throws-rocks-at-windscreen/C7RJCO7KL5G4PIF4AYIDRLHP5Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-transport-bus-damaging-after-disgruntled-passenger- throws-rocks-at-windscreen/C7RJCO7KL5G4PIF4AYIDRLHP5Q/ Benjamin PlummerThe passenger allegedly abused the bus driver before the shocking act. Sat, 14 Dec 2024 05:33:31 +0000 A witness has alleged a disgruntled passenger threw rocks at the windscreen of an Auckland Transport bus after being told to leave by the driver.
Napier Mongrel Mob funeral: Eight arrests as some mourners flout patch ban at funeral for Angus Benson https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/napier-mongrel-mob-funeral-eight-arrests-as-some-mourners-flout-patch-ban-at-funeral-for-angus-benson/PCXQZP5CMBCADPGP4PHTDOKB6Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/napier-mongrel-mob-funeral-eight-arrests-as-some-mourners-flout-patch-ban-at-funeral-for-angus-benson/PCXQZP5CMBCADPGP4PHTDOKB6Y/ Ben Leahy, Jack RiddellThe funeral is for Napier's Angus Benson, a Mongrel Mob Barbarian chapter president. Sat, 14 Dec 2024 05:24:48 +0000 Police say several arrests were made for flouting the new gang patch ban and 'other breaches have been noted and will be followed up'. Photo / Paul Taylor
Daryl Rope, Craig Holtom jailed for illegal gun-trafficking scheme in Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/daryl-rope-craig-holtom-jailed-for-illegal-gun-trafficking-scheme-in-auckland/CVM7VV3TFFB75DQ4WSITRML434/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/daryl-rope-craig-holtom-jailed-for-illegal-gun-trafficking-scheme-in-auckland/CVM7VV3TFFB75DQ4WSITRML434/ Craig KapitanPolice found text messages in which the duo discussed grinding serial numbers off guns. Sat, 14 Dec 2024 03:00:00 +0000 Authorities cordon off a Grey Lynn street in July 2002 where police shot Kodie Remana after he pointed a gun at them. A firearm found at the scene had been illegally sold to Remana's mother by Craig Holtom and Daryl Rope. Photo / Michael Craig

Lily Che and Michael Fu to hand over $2.2 million in assets following money-laundering prosecution https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lily-che-and-michael-fu-to-hand-over-22m-in-assets-following-money-laundering-prosecution/3PM4MWB6BJH3PPDTWBTTI4OL7Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lily-che-and-michael-fu-to-hand-over-22m-in-assets-following-money-laundering-prosecution/3PM4MWB6BJH3PPDTWBTTI4OL7Y/ Ric StevensThey were convicted under anti-money-laundering law for moving $53m for a businessman. Sat, 14 Dec 2024 01:00:00 +0000 Fuqin (Lily) Che and Qiang (Michael) Fu will forfeit $2.2 million in assets to the Crown.
Auckland hit and run in Henderson: 52-year-old arrested, victim critically hurt https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-hit-and-run-person-taken-to-hospital-with-ritic-injuries/D2TRMPUKUNE7XKHKJMQWTRTZZ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-hit-and-run-person-taken-to-hospital-with-ritic-injuries/D2TRMPUKUNE7XKHKJMQWTRTZZ4/ Ben LeahyA 52-year-old man faces a range of charges and a vehicle has been seized, police say. Sat, 14 Dec 2024 00:30:51 +0000 Police and emergency teams rushed to Railside Ave in West Auckland to help a person hurt in a hit-and-run incident about 12.25am. Photo / NZME
